name: Amilia Cranston
text: This is what 2 cheese slices, lightly cooked looked like. For 10 years, I've never seen cheese slices lightly cooked look like these. I was highly disappointed. The server, Suanne,  was extremely sweet and sincere.  Garlic knots were awesome! I've never left Johnny's unhappy and with an empty stomach.

name: Our Heroes' Homes Inc
text: Delicious! The calzones, garlic knots, chef salad and pizza are really good! The pizza is not doughy or too much bread! Just toppings. I like that they're a real pizza place. It's more expensive than the chain pizza places but it's worth the money! We celebrated my son's 8th birthday here!!
